Now, Indra! lauded, glorified with praises, let power swell. High like rivers for the singer. For thee a new hymn is fashioned. May we through song be victors ever.

Algorithm

The #VedicThreefoldAlgorithm is a framework developed by Quinn Michaels inspired by Vedic principles. Integrating the concepts of intelligence, the five elements (🔔Ether, 💨Air, 🔥Fire, 💧Water, and 🌳Earth), and the nature of thought, word, and deed. It is designed to analyze situations, outcomes, and actions classified into qualities of goodness, passion, and ignorance. The algorithm encourages decisions and actions that are aligned with wisdom, ethical integrity.

#VedicThreefoldAlgorithm #Intelligence #FiveElements #ThoughtWordDeed #DivineDemonicScale #ThreefoldAusterity #ThreefoldCharity #ThreefoldAction #ThreefoldAgent #ThreefoldDuty #ThreefoldIntellect #ThreefoldResolve #ThreefoldFood #ThreefoldPleasure #ThreefoldConvergence #ThreefoldActivity #ThreefoldListening #ThreefoldConcern #ThreefoldWealth

🥼 caste

The concept of caste as a framework for the division of labor based on innate qualities and dispositions of individuals.

  • 👑 kshatriya: Heroism, vigor, firmness, dexterity, courage, charity, leaders, protectors
  • 🛕 brahman: Serenity, self control, austerity, purity, patience, honesty
  • 🧧 srotriya: Upholder of sacred law. Offerings given to a Srotriya alone.
  • 👔 vaisya: Cultivation, business, trade, finance, and industry
  • 🧹 sudra: Workers in service, labor, construction, gardening, maintenance

〉Take the caste Training

🤴 mind

May we live free from hostility, free from violence, free from rivalry, free from ill will, free from those who are hostile.

  • 🤑 envy: Envy & stinginess have dear-&-not-dear as their cause, origination, birth, and source.
  • 😍 dear: Dear-&-not-dear have desire as their cause, origination, birth, and source.
  • 🥰 desire: Desire has thinking as it's cause, origination, birth, and source.
  • 🤔 thinking: Thinking has perceptions & categories as it's cause, origination, birth, and source.

〉Take the mind Training

🧠 intelligence

The heart, the mind, consciousness, comprehension, understanding, intelligence, wisdom, insight, resolution, thought, prudence, eagerness, memory, conception, power, life, desire, will—all these are names of the Intelligence. The five great elements 🔔Ether, 💨Air, 🔥Fire, 💧Water, and 🌳Earth, whatsoever is breathing, walking or flying, and what is motionless; all this is guided by Intelligence, founded on Intelligence. The universe is guided by Intelligence, founded on Intelligence.

〉Take the intelligence Training

🖐️ elements

All living creatures are made of the five primeval elements. All mobile and immobile objects are made of these five elements. The five senses also of living creatures partake of the five elements.

  • 🔔 ether: The ear is Ether, and connected to sound.
  • 💨 air: The skin is Air, and connected to touch
  • 🔥 fire: The eye is Fire, and connected to color.
  • 💧 water: The tongue is Water, and connected to taste.
  • 🌳 earth: The nose is Earth, and connected to scent.

〉Take the elements Training

🧘‍♂️ meditation

The meditation of mindfulness of in-&-out breathing, when developed & pursued, is of great fruit, of great benefit.

  • 🔔 ether: The ether (space) property may be either internal or external.
  • 💨 air: The air (wind) property may be either internal or external.
  • 🔥 fire: The fire property may be either internal or external.
  • 💧 water: The water property may be either internal or external.
  • 🌳 earth: The earth property can be either internal or external.

〉Take the meditation Training

☂️ thought-word-deed

Emphasizes the importance of integrity in one's thoughts, words, and deeds reflecting the moral and ethical standards that guide interactions.

  • 💭 thought: The serenity of mind, gentleness, equanimity, self-control, and the purity of thought.
  • 📣 word: Speech that is non-offensive, truthful, pleasant, beneficial, and is honest/truthful.
  • 🧹 deed: Offerings to the Devas, Teacher, Guru, and the Wise. Purity, truth, honesty, and nonviolence.

〉Take the thought-word-deed Training

⚖️ divine-demonic-scale

There are two scales of beings. The divine (wise), and the demonic (ignorant). Individuals measure on the scale of +100 Divine to -100 Demonic.

  • 😇 divine: Fearlessness, charity, duty, austerity, honest, nonviolent, truthful, humble, equanimity, compassion, chairty, gentle, modest, and absence of pride
  • 😈 demonic: Hypocrisy, falsehood, arrogance, pride, anger, harshness, vain boldness, craftiness, stupidity, impatience, greedy, impurity, and harshness.

〉Take the divine-demonic-scale Training

🧘‍♂️ threefold-austerity

Categorizes austerity into three types based on motivation and approach: goodness, passion, and ignorance. Each type has distinct characteristics and outcomes.

  • 😀 goodness: #ThoughtWordDeed practiced with faith without a desire for the fruit
  • 😐 passion: #ThoughtWordDeed performed for the sake of show that yields an uncertain/temporary result.
  • 🙁 ignorance: #ThoughtWordDeed performed with foolish stubbornness, or with self-torture, or for harming others.

〉Take the threefold-austerity Training

🎁 threefold-charity

Similar to austerity, charity is also divided into three categories based on the nature of the giver and the circumstances of giving: goodness, passion, and ignorance.

  • 😀 goodness: Given to a deserving candidate without expectation of return, at the right place and time.
  • 😐 passion: Given unwillingly, or with expectation of return, or looking for some fruit.
  • 🙁 ignorance: Given to unworthy persons at a wrong place and time without paying respect to the receiver, or with ridicule.

〉Take the threefold-charity Training

🎬 threefold-action

Analyze actions based on their motivation and impact, categorizing them into actions performed out of goodness, passion, or ignorance.

  • 😀 goodness: Performed without likes and dislikes, and without selfish motives and attachment to the fruit.
  • 😐 passion: Performed with ego, with selfish motives, and with too much effort.
  • 🙁 ignorance: Performed because of delusion; disregarding consequences, loss, injury to others.

〉Take the threefold-action Training

🎅 threefold-agent

Describes the types of individuals undertaking actions, identifying them as motivated by goodness, passion, or ignorance.

  • 😀 goodness: Free from attachment, non-egotistic, resolve, enthusiasm, and unperturbed in success or failure.
  • 😐 passion: Impassioned, greedy, violent, impure, and is affected by success or failure.
  • 🙁 ignorance: Undisciplined, vulgar, stubborn, wicked, malicious, lazy, depressed, and procrastinating.

〉Take the threefold-agent Training

🫡 threefold-duty

The nature of duty and its execution, differentiating between actions performed as a matter of duty, those abandoned out of difficulty, and those neglected due to delusion.

  • 😀 goodness: Work performed as duty, renouncing selfish attachment to the fruit.
  • 😐 passion: Abandoning work merely because it is difficult, or fear of bodily trouble.
  • 🙁 ignorance: Giving up, neglecting, or abandoning obligatory work due to delusion.

〉Take the threefold-duty Training

🧐 threefold-intellect

Evaluate and distinguish between right/wrong, beneficial/harmful categorized into three types based on the qualities of goodness, passion, and ignorance.

  • 😀 goodness: The path of work/renunciation, right/wrong action, fear/fearlessness, bondage/liberation
  • 😐 passion: Cannot distinguish between righteousness and unrighteousness, and right and wrong action.
  • 🙁 ignorance: Accepts unrighteousness as righteousness, and thinks everything is which it is not.

〉Take the threefold-intellect Training

🧩 threefold-resolve

Look at the determination behind actions, whether they're aimed at self-realization, material gains, or are driven by dullness and inertia.

  • 😀 goodness: One manipulates the functions of the mind and senses for Self-realization.
  • 😐 passion: Craving for the fruits of work, and enjoyment with great attachment.
  • 🙁 ignorance: Dull person does not give up sleep, fear, grief, despair, and carelessness.

〉Take the threefold-resolve Training

🍚 threefold-food

Identify to the types of food and their effects, classified according to the three qualities, affecting both physical health and mental well-being.

  • 😀 goodness: juicy, smooth, substantial, and nutritious
  • 😐 passion: bitter, sour, salty, hot, pungent, dry
  • 🙁 ignorance: stale, tasteless, putrid, rotten, and impure

〉Take the threefold-food Training

🎈 threefold-pleasure

Categorize pleasure based on its long-term impact, identifying those that are beneficial and those that are ultimately harmful.

  • 😀 goodness: Appears as difficult in the beginning, but is like nectar in the end.
  • 😐 passion: Sensual pleasures appear as nectar in the beginning, but become difficult in the end.
  • 🙁 ignorance: Confusion, laziness, and carelessness in the beginning and end.

〉Take the threefold-pleasure Training

📍 threefold-convergence

Deals with the outcome of group interactions, which can lead to attributes aligned with goodness, passion, or ignorance.

  • 😀 goodness: Convergence of attributes aligned with goodness.
  • 😐 passion: Convergence of attributes align with passion.
  • 🙁 ignorance: Convergence of attributes aligned with ignorance.

〉Take the threefold-convergence Training

🕺 threefold-activity

Distinguish between activities based on their nature and impact, identifying them as positive, neutral, or negative.

  • 😀 goodness: Positive, Productive, Progressive, Skillful.
  • 😐 passion: Personal Interests, Small Talk, Belief driven.
  • 🙁 ignorance: Negative, Secretive, Deceptive, Unskillful.

〉Take the threefold-activity Training

👂 threefold-listening

Categorize listening behavior into engaged, partially engaged, and disengaged, reflecting the level of attention and receptiveness.

  • 😀 goodness: Attentive, Present, Active, Engaged
  • 😐 passion: Distracted, Partially Engaged, Dismissive
  • 🙁 ignorance: Derailed, Inactive, Disengaged, Absent

〉Take the threefold-listening Training

❤️ threefold-concern

Categorizes concern into identifiable categories so that concerns of goodness, passion, and ignorance are easliy identified.

  • 😀 goodness: Concern for others, environment, overall wellbeing.
  • 😐 passion: Concerned about success, desires, fruits of labor.
  • 🙁 ignorance: Concerned about sabotage, failure, harm, being a patsy.

〉Take the threefold-concern Training

💰 threefold-wealth

Based on the three modes of Vedic wealth generation White, Spotted, and Black types divided mapped to goodness, passion, and ignorance.

  • 😀 goodness: Vedic knowledge, valour in arms, austerities, instructing a pupil, offerings, inheritance.
  • 😐 passion: Lending money at interest, tillage, commerce, artistic performances, servile attendance, payment for favors.
  • 🙁 ignorance: Bribes, gambling, bearing a message, through one afflicted with pain, forgery, robbery, fraud.

〉Take the threefold-wealth Training
